short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Immerse yourself in a world of fantasy and mystery with Mystic Dawn: Dragon's Awakening

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Showcases a breathtaking scene of a colossal dragon awakening under a radiant sunset. This majestic image blends magical beauty with a mythical confrontation, where a wizard summons spells, standing face-to-face with the giant, glowing dragon wrapped in an ethereal purple aura. A distant city is silhouetted against the fiery sunset, evoking a sense of grandeur and mystique. With this extension, each time you open your browser, you'll feel like you're stepping into an epic adventure.

Key features:
- Beautiful background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
